<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt">最近写了些和函数式编程的文章，有读者和我讨论函数式编程和面向对象编程的优劣。二者都是很好的编程思想，都在着力解决代码重用的问题，也彼此吸收对方的优点，所以大可不必去分个高下。然而，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt">我面试过许多号称精通面向对象编程（比如：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Python
/ Ruby / C++</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）的工程师，随便问几个问题，就可以看出这个人对面向对象的理解：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

mso-font-kerning:0pt">你觉得在面向对象编程中，最重要的思想是什么？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt">如果有人提及「多态」，我会让她解释一下多态，并让她写个她在工作中使用多态的例子。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

mso-font-kerning:0pt">如果有人提及「代码重用」，我会让她谈谈她对代码重用的理解，并附上一个工作中重用的例子。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt">对第一个问题，很多人回答继承，有些人会添上接口，多态等概念，很少人会提及代码重用。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt">上文中我们调侃的那个「鸟能飞，也会叫，鸭子呱呱呱但不会飞」的所谓面向对象的例子实质上破坏了里氏变换原则。它让你的代码无法享受多态的好处。比如说，你围绕着「鸟」这一基类打造了一个系统，系统的后期开发者用「鸭子」继承了「鸟」，当你的代码执行「飞」这一操作时，由于鸭子不会飞，系统有可能会崩溃（或者抛出异常）。这时你不得不回过头来修改围绕基类打造的系统：当「飞」这个操作运行时，处理一切异常（有时这并不可行）。这就违反了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
